channel.title: Adding Dice to My server 317 [PI]
channel.description: I want to add the Dice Bag to my server but everytime i try, it gives me a compiling error and ends up not working. I'm not going to type out the error because i know what it's saying kind of. It has a problem with the code I put into clickitem.java and as soon as i delete the code from clickitem.java everythings back to normal but i still dont have a dice bag. At first I was trying to add the dicebag itself into my game. But then i tried adding the roll option on a item of my choice. neither worked. Comment if you can help please.

item.title: Adding Dice to My server 317 [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Joseph69 Joseph69
item.description:
@Joseph69 wrote:

Send me your Skype name, I can assist you.

item.title: Adding Dice to My server 317 [PI]

item.description:
@zackary wrote:

I want to add the Dice Bag to my server but everytime i try, it gives me a compiling error and ends up not working. I’m not going to type out the error because i know what it’s saying kind of. It has a problem with the code I put into clickitem.java and as soon as i delete the code from clickitem.java everythings back to normal but i still dont have a dice bag. At first I was trying to add the dicebag itself into my game. But then i tried adding the roll option on a item of my choice. neither worked. Comment if you can help please.
